Zi Lin

[firstname].[lastname]@pku.edu.cn

Iâ€™m an undergraduate student in the Department of Chinese language and literature at Peking University. My academic interests are interdisciplinary, including (1) using computational methods to investigate fundamental linguistic questions and (2) applying findings from linguistics to develop techniques for automatic natural language understanding.
